citations.narrative:
This site is no longer active and according to the operations manager at the address listed, no regulated species can be
transported out of this site as there is no climate controlled transport available. Air Canada ceased operations in 2016 and
did not inform the AC Deputy Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or other
change in operations affecting its status as a carrier, within 10 days after making such change.
Correct by: Nov 30, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a site representative at the ROC address and the report was sent
to the headquarters of the entity listed.
n

narrative:
2.27(a) 
   
Notification of change of operation. 
This site is no longer active and according to the operations manager at the address listed, no regulated species can be 
transported out of this site as there is no climate controlled transport available. Air Canada ceased operations in 2016 and 
did not inform the AC Deputy Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or other 
change in operations affecting its status as a carrier, within 10 days after making such change. 
 
Correct by: Nov 30, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a site representative at the ROC address and the report was sent 
to the headquarters of the entity listed. 
 
 n
